channel.title: Wtf am i getting disconnected?
channel.description:
OK, so im fighting somebody then i k0 them, after they came back to attack me, then i got a disconnection, and i keep having disconnections and im constantly loggin out all the time, until that player stops, i can attack that player and get skulled. that is stupid and i want to fix.
- i need major help! please anything just tell me how to solve.
^ok incase you didn't understand what im trying to say i have a picture and a small gif that will explain what happened, down below:
PIC: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/124eykn.jpg[/img]
GIF: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/vnkq2r.gif[/img]
_ __ ___ __posted by cowbell__ ___ ___ __ ___
